#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
inline int read()
{
    int n = 0;
    char c = getchar();
    while (!('0' <= c && c <= '9')) {
        c = getchar();
    }
    while ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
        n = n * 10 + c - '0';
        c = getchar();
    }
    return n;
}
 
inline void fast(int a)
{
	register char c;
	char snum[20];
	int i=0;
	do
	{
	snum[i++]=a%10+48;
	a=a/10;
	}while(a!=0);
	i=i-1;
	while(i>=0)
	putchar(snum[i--]);
	putchar('\n');
}
 
int main()
{	 int t;
	t=read();
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,q,i,j,b;
		n=read();
		q=read();
		int a[n+2],v[n+2],w[n+2];
		
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			a[i]=read();
		}
		v[0]=0;
		w[n+1]=0;
		v[1]=a[1];
		w[n]=a[n];		
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			v[i]=__gcd(v[i-1],a[i]);
		}
		for(i=n-1;i>=1;i--)
		{
			w[i]=__gcd(w[i+1],a[i]);
		}
		while(q--)
		{
			int x,y,gc;
			x=read();
			y=read();
			gc=__gcd(v[x-1],w[y+1]);
			fast(gc);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
